description.name: oneinchbep20
description.tagline: 1INCH Token bep20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto bep20-1inch Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept 1INCH Token bep20 directly on your website
Unique bep20/1inch receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your bep20/1inch wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
